description.narrative: This activity (J4A - Justice for All) is a component of Justice for All Programme reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £50,451,026. This component benefits Nigeria, and works in the following sector(s): Public sector policy and administrative management, Anti-corruption organisations and institutions, Domestic revenue mobilisation, Legal and judicial development, Human rights, Security system management and reform. , with the following implementing partners: British Council. The start date is 01-10-2008 and the end date is 30-05-2017.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

sector.narrative: Public sector policy and administrative management
